title: File Access Denied Errors
description: Fix permission errors when trying to access, edit, or delete files and folders.

steps.title: Run as Administrator
steps.instruction: Right-click the program or file → Select 'Run as administrator'. This gives elevated permissions to access the file.

steps.title: Take Ownership of File
steps.instruction: Right-click file/folder → Properties → Security tab → Advanced → Change owner to your username → Check 'Replace owner on subcontainers' → OK.

steps.title: Check File Permissions
steps.instruction: Right-click file → Properties → Security → Select your username → Click 'Edit' → Check 'Full control' → Apply → OK.

steps.title: Disable Read-Only Attribute
steps.instruction: Right-click file → Properties → General tab → Uncheck 'Read-only' → Apply → OK.

steps.title: Check if File is Open in Another Program
steps.instruction: Close all programs that might be using the file. Restart computer if necessary to release file locks.
